entry_requirements_raw.A-Level:
Minimum Grade BBB or ABC in Biology, Chemistry and Physics / Mathematics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
5Bs each in: Biology; and Chemistry; and Physics; and Mathematics/ Additional Mathematics; and another subject (except Art/ KSI)
entry_requirements_raw.UEC:
Grade B4 in Biology,Chemistry,Physics and Advanced Mathematics (I) and (II).  SPM-level or equivalent:
5Bs each in: Biology; and Chemistry; and Physics; and Mathematics/ Additional Mathematics; and another subject (except Art/ KSI)
entry_requirements_raw.Diploma:
CGPA 3.0 (out of 4.0) AND provided the course is not less than 5 semesters or 2 ½ years and completed in the same institution..  SPM-level or equivalent:
Minimum 2 Bs in  any 2 subjects in Biology; and/or Chemistry; and/or Physics AND Credits in 3 subjects in English; and Mathematics or Additional Mathematics; and another subject
entry_requirements_raw.STPM:
Minimum BBB or ABC in Biology, Chemistry and Physics / Mathematics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
5Bs each in: Biology; and Chemistry; and Physics; and Mathematics/ Additional Mathematics; and another subject (except Art/ KSI)
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation:
Pass with CGPA 3.00 in Biology, Chemistry, Physics/Mathematics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
5Bs each in: Biology; and Chemistry; and Physics; and Mathematics/ Additional Mathematics; and another subject (except Art/ KSI)
entry_requirements_raw.CPU:
Average of 80% in 3 subjects in Biology; and Chemistry; and Physics or Mathematic.  SPM-level or equivalent:
5Bs each in: Biology; and Chemistry; and Physics; and Mathematics/ Additional Mathematics; and another subject (except Art/ KSI)
entry_requirements_raw.IB Diploma:
A minimum of 30 points overall AND Attained a minimum score of 5 each in 3 of the following subject in Biology; and Chemistry; and Physics or Mathematics with a minimum of 2 at Higher Level (HL) and 1 at Standard Level.  SPM-level or equivalent:
5Bs each in: Biology; and Chemistry; and Physics; and Mathematics/ Additional Mathematics; and another subject (except Art/ KSI)
entry_requirements_raw.SACE/WACE:
80% ATAR provided the subjects include in Biology; and Chemistry; and Physics or Mathematics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
5Bs each in: Biology; and Chemistry; and Physics; and Mathematics/ Additional Mathematics; and another subject (except Art/ KSI)

course_content.core: Phase 1 Anatomy Biochemistry Medical Microbiology General Pathology Pre-Clinical Prosthodontics Oral Biology Pharmacology Physiology Dental Material & Dental Technology Pre-Clinical Conservative Dentistry Phase 2 Community Dentistry Conservative Dentistry & Edodontics Oral Maxillofacial Surgery/Radiology Oral Medicine Prosthodontics General Dental Practice Human Disease (General Medicine & Surgery) Paediatric Dentistry & Orthodontics Oral Pathology Periodontics

programs.program_name: Bachelor of Medicine & Bachelor of Surgery (MBBS)

entry_requirements_raw.A-Level:
Minimum Grade BBB or ABC in Biology, Chemistry and Physics / Mathematics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 5Bs including Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics
credit in Bahasa Melayu and English required to practise Medicine in Malaysia
entry_requirements_raw.UEC:
Grade B4 in Biology,Chemistry,Physics and Advanced Mathematics (I) and (II).  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 5Bs including Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics
credit in Bahasa Melayu and English required to practise Medicine in Malaysia
entry_requirements_raw.Diploma:
Diploma in Health Sciences with minimum CGPA 3.50 and provided the course is not less than 5 semesters or 2.5 years in the same accredited institution.  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 2Bs including Biology, Chemistry or Physics
credit in Mathematics, English and another subject
in addition, credit in Bahasa Melayu required to practise Medicine in Malaysia
entry_requirements_raw.STPM:
Minimum BBB or ABC in Biology, Chemistry and Physics / Mathematics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 5Bs including Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics
credit in Bahasa Melayu and English required to practise Medicine in Malaysia
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation:
Pass with CGPA 3.00 in Biology, Chemistry, Physics/Mathematics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 5Bs including Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics
credit in Bahasa Melayu and English required to practise Medicine in Malaysia
entry_requirements_raw.CPU:
Average of 80% in 3 subjects in Biology; and Chemistry; and Physics or Mathematics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 5Bs including Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics
credit in Bahasa Melayu and English required to practise Medicine in Malaysia
entry_requirements_raw.SACE/WACE:
80% ATAR provided the subjects include in Biology; and Chemistry; and Physics or Mathematics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 5Bs including Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics
credit in Bahasa Melayu and English required to practise Medicine in Malaysia

programs.program_name: Bachelor of Science (Honours) in Occupational Therapy

entry_requirements_raw.A-Level: Pass with minimum Grade D in TWO (2) of the following subjects (Biology, Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry).
entry_requirements_raw.UEC: Pass with minimum Grade B5 in FIVE (5) subjects including (Biology/Physics and Chemistry).
entry_requirements_raw.Diploma: Pass with minimum CGPA 2.75 in related field.
entry_requirements_raw.STPM: Pass with minimum GPA 2.33 or Grade C+ in TWO (2) of the following subjects (Biology, Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry).
entry_requirements_raw.CPU: Pass with average minimum of 55% for THREE (3) subjects including (Biology/Physics and Chemistry).
entry_requirements_raw.IB Diploma: Pass with minimum score of at least 24 points including (Biology/Physics and Chemistry).
entry_requirements_raw.SACE/WACE: Pass with minimum Scaled Score of 12 in THREE (3) subjects including (Biology/Physics and Chemistry).

course_content.core: PROGRAMME STRUCTURE Year 1 Anatomy Human Physiology Basics to Occupational Therapy Introduction to Psychology Basic Clinical Skills for Occupational Therapy General Medicine Co-Curriculum Community Service General Pharmacology Introduction to Neuropsychology Occupational Analysis and Therapeutic Activity Basic Pathology Clinical Placement: Introduction Co-Curriculum Community Service MPU subjects Year 2 Clinical Orthopaedics Occupational Therapy for Orthopaedic and Surgical Conditions Orthotics, Prosthetics and Pressure Garment in Occupation Therapy Applied Kinesiology and Biomechanics Neurological Conditions Occupational Therapy for Medical & Neurological Conditions Developmental Psychology Ergonomics Elective: (Choose 1) : Neuroscience / Communication and Basic Counselling Clinical Placement: Orthopaedic and Neurological Conditions MPU subjects Year 3 Clinical Paediatrics Occupational Therapy for Paediatric Conditions Research for Allied Health Profession Critical Review of Journals Aged Care Psychiatric Conditions Occupational Therapy for Psychiatric Conditions Biostatistics Community Based Rehabilitation Work and Driving Rehabilitation Clinical Placement: Paediatric, Psychiatric & Aged Care Year 4 Clinical Placement: Work and Driving Rehabilitation Occupational Therapy Administration and Management Health Promotion in Occupational Therapy Occupational Therapy for Innovation and Entrepreneurship Electives (Choose 2): Sexuality and Disability / Assistive Technology and Universal Accessibility / Student Mobility Program / Special Education in Occupational Therapy Research for Allied Health Profession Research Writing for Allied Health Profession Final Clinical Placement

A-Level.text: Pass with minimum Grade D in TWO (2) of the following subjects (Biology, Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry).

UEC.text: Pass with minimum Grade B5 in FIVE (5) subjects including (Biology/Physics and Chemistry).

Diploma.text: Pass with minimum CGPA 2.75 in related field.

STPM.text: Pass with minimum GPA 2.33 or Grade C+ in TWO (2) of the following subjects (Biology, Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry).

CPU.text: Pass with average minimum of 55% for THREE (3) subjects including (Biology/Physics and Chemistry).

IB Diploma.text: Pass with minimum score of at least 24 points including (Biology/Physics and Chemistry).

SACE/WACE.text: Pass with minimum Scaled Score of 12 in THREE (3) subjects including (Biology/Physics and Chemistry).

entry_requirements_raw.A-Level: Pass with minimum Grade D in TWO (2) of the following subjects: Biology, Physics / Mathematics, Chemistry.
entry_requirements_raw.UEC: Pass with minimum Grade B5 in FIVE (5) subjects including: Chemistry, Biology / Physics, 3 other subjects.
entry_requirements_raw.Diploma: Minimum CGPA < 2.75 in related field with minimum 3 years (36 months) working experience in related field..
entry_requirements_raw.STPM: Pass with minimum GPA ≥ 2.33 or Grade C+ in TWO (2) of the following subjects: Biology, Physics / Mathematics, Chemistry.
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation: Minimum CGPA < 2.75 in related field with minimum 3 years (36 months) working experience in related field..
entry_requirements_raw.IB Diploma: Pass with minimum score of at least 24 points including: Chemistry, Biology / Physics.

A-Level.text: Pass with minimum Grade D in TWO (2) of the following subjects: Biology, Physics / Mathematics, Chemistry.

UEC.text: Pass with minimum Grade B5 in FIVE (5) subjects including: Chemistry, Biology / Physics, 3 other subjects.

Diploma.text: Minimum CGPA < 2.75 in related field with minimum 3 years (36 months) working experience in related field..

STPM.text: Pass with minimum GPA ≥ 2.33 or Grade C+ in TWO (2) of the following subjects: Biology, Physics / Mathematics, Chemistry.

Foundation.text: Minimum CGPA < 2.75 in related field with minimum 3 years (36 months) working experience in related field..

IB Diploma.text: Pass with minimum score of at least 24 points including: Chemistry, Biology / Physics.

entry_requirements_raw.A-Level: Minimum of two full passes (C-grade) with CGPA 2.00.  Credits in Mathematics and Biology/Physics/Chemistry/ General Science/ Applied Science, and a pass in English
entry_requirements_raw.STPM: Minimum of two full passes (C-grade) with CGPA 2.00.  Credits in Mathematics and Biology/Physics/Chemistry/ General Science/ Applied Science, and a pass in English

course_content.core: Year 1 Introduction to Psychology Research Methods Statistics 1 Child Psychology Intelligence Memory Learning Statistics 2 Adolescent Psychology Motivation and Emotion Physiological Psychology History and Systems in Psychology MPU Subjects Year 2 Psychology of Adulthood Personality Psychology Abnormal Psychology Sensation & Perception Health Psychology Counselling Psychology Professional and Ethics in Psychology Clinical Psychology Cross-Cultural Psychology Research Project 1(Thesis) MPU Subjects Year 3 Psychological Test and Measurements Psychology of Language and Communication Cognitive Psychology Social Psychology Behaviour Modication Research Project 2 (Thesis) Industrial Training (Practicum)

credit in Bahasa Melayu and English required to practise Medicine in Malaysia

entry_requirements_raw.UEC:

credit in Bahasa Melayu and English required to practise Medicine in Malaysia
